name: fuzzy-file-search
title: Fuzzy File Search
description: Search files and directories using fuzzy finding. Type parts of the path of the file including directories to find the file you are looking for.
author: erykksc

commands.name: search-for-files
commands.title: Search Files
commands.description: Searches for files using fzf algorithm. Allows to fuzzy find the files based on their path. Uses fd under the hood to ignore the files ignored by git and hidden files.

preferences.name: includeDirectories
preferences.title: Include directories in results
preferences.label: Look for both directories and files
preferences.description: If enabled, the results will include files and directories. If disabled, the search will only look for files.

preferences.name: ignoreSpacesInSearch
preferences.title: Ignore Spaces in Search
preferences.label: Treat spaces as empty characters
preferences.description: If enabled, spaces in the search query will be ignored (useful for more flexible matching).

preferences.name: customSearchDirs
preferences.title: Custom Search Directories
preferences.description: The list of directories to start in. The search will run in all of those directories. Separate each directory with a whitespace ' '

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
